apiKey.label: OpenAlerts API Key
apiKey.help: Optional. Get from app.openalerts.dev. Enables platform diagnosis & dashboard.

alertChannel.label: Alert Channel
alertChannel.help: telegram, discord, slack, etc. Auto-detected if blank.

alertTo.label: Alert To
alertTo.help: Chat/user ID to send alerts to. Auto-detected from allowFrom if blank.

alertAccountId.label: Account ID
alertAccountId.help: For multi-account setups. Default account used if blank.

cooldownMinutes.label: Alert Cooldown
cooldownMinutes.help: Minimum minutes between repeated alerts of the same type. Default: 15.

quiet.label: Quiet Mode
quiet.help: Log alerts to file only â€” no messages sent to your channels.

rules.cost-hourly-spike.threshold.label: Hourly Cost Threshold (USD)
rules.cost-hourly-spike.threshold.help: Alert when total LLM spend in the last 60 minutes exceeds this amount. Default: 5.0.

rules.cost-daily-budget.threshold.label: Daily Budget Threshold (USD)
rules.cost-daily-budget.threshold.help: Alert when total LLM spend in the last 24 hours exceeds this amount. Default: 20.0.
